description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: An issue was discovered in ROS2 Iron Irwini versions ROS_VERSION 2 and ROS_PYTHON_VERSION 3, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via packages or nodes within the ROS2 system.

Se descubrió un problema en las versiones ROS2 Iron Irwini ROS_VERSION 2 y ROS_PYTHON_VERSION 3, que permite a atacantes remotos ejecutar código arbitrario a través de paquetes o nodos dentro del sistema ROS2.
